General.Name: Starhedge SA
General.Description: Starhedge S.A. invests in the fields of power industry, financial sector, commodities and real estate markets, and new technologies in Poland and internationally. The company buys stock in companies from the financial sector, and power and real estate industries. It also invests in commodities and other financial instruments, including derivatives comprising futures, options, and currencies, as well as bonds. In addition, the company acquires and sells stocks of public companies; conducts analysis of specific markets; and provides consulting services. Starhedge S.A. was founded in 1970 and is based in Warsaw, Poland.
